title: Witchblade Volume 8
description: War has arrived to Witchblade! Since the events of First Born, Sara Pezzini (the long time bearer and NYC Detective) and Dani Baptiste (the inexperienced classically trained dancer) have peacefully each shared half of the powerful, mystical gauntlet known as the Witchblade. But now, events out of their control will bring them into direct conflict for control over the full Witchblade.War of the Witchblades is the most ambitious and epic story to date by long time writer Ron Marz (Green Lantern) and hot artistic sensation Stjepan Sejic (Broken Trinity). Collects the full storyline from Witchblade #125-130.
author: Ron Marz
